body_text:
Here we attempt to access state.app.users:
https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/redesign/recipe-server/client/control_new/state/app/users/selectors.js#L4
But it looks like it should be:
state.app.user
Object { items: Object }
from this reference:
https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/redesign/recipe-server/client/control_new/state/app/reducer.js#L21

title: Error in getUser Selector
body:
Here we attempt to access state.app.users:

https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/redesign/recipe-server/client/control_new/state/app/users/selectors.js#L4

But it looks like it should be:
